name: Bexecu
strategy_rules:
select(P, O, S, M):-
    \+ holds(last_move(O, _LMo), S),
    holds(default_move(P, M), S).
select(_P, O, S, Mo):-
    holds(last_move(O, Mo), S).
game_rules:
:- discontiguous payoff/4.
:- discontiguous initially/2.
:- discontiguous possible/2.

/* Game specific predicates for Film Release Game */

% Payoff matrix ('H' for Holiday, 'R' for Regular weekend)
payoff('H', 'H', 3, 2).  % Both release on holiday: indie gets attention
payoff('H', 'R', 5, 1).  % Hollywood on holiday, indie on regular
payoff('R', 'H', 1, 3).  % Hollywood on regular, indie on holiday
payoff('R', 'R', 2, 1).  % Both on regular weekend

% Initial state
initial(s0).

% What holds initially
initially(player(hollywood), s0).
initially(player(indie), s0).
initially(role(hollywood,row), s0).
initially(role(indie,col), s0).
initially(control(hollywood), s0).
initially(control(indie), s0).
initially(default_move(_, 'R'), s0).

% What is possible for a player to choose
possible(move(P,'H'), S):- holds(player(P), S).
possible(move(P,'R'), S):- holds(player(P), S).

% Moves that are opposite to each other
opposite_move('H', 'R').
opposite_move('R', 'H').
